title: Build Me Up
description: Kristen Barnes is a California girl through and through, whoâ€™s become successful as an architect and interior designer catering to the rich and famous. Hired to work on a special project in a small town in Massachusetts, she runs into trouble. Man-sized, stubble-coated and toolbox-equipped trouble. Oh, and cats. Lots and lots of cats.
author: Lili Grouse
